trans-unit.source: Generates common language runtime (CLR) metadata for a COM+ component.
trans-unit.target: 產生 COM+ 元件的 Common Language Runtime (CLR) 中繼資料。

trans-unit.source: If necessary, the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.GenerateMetadata> class generates an assembly that contains CLR metadata for a specified type library.
trans-unit.target: 如有必要，<xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.GenerateMetadata>類別產生組件，其中包含指定的類型程式庫的 CLR 中繼資料。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.GenerateMetadata> is used internally by the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.GenerateMetadata> 為.NET framework 內部使用。

trans-unit.source: You do not need to use the class directly in your code.
trans-unit.target: 您不需要直接在您的程式碼中使用的類別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.GenerateMetadata" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.GenerateMetadata" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The name of the type library for which to generate an assembly.
trans-unit.target: 要產生組件的類型程式庫名稱。

trans-unit.source: The folder in which to generate an assembly or to locate an already existing assembly.
trans-unit.target: 要在其中產生組件或尋找已存在組件的資料夾。

trans-unit.source: Generates, or locates, an assembly that contains common language runtime (CLR) metadata for a COM+ component represented by the specified type library.
trans-unit.target: 針對由指定類型程式庫表示的 COM+ 元件，產生或尋找包含 Common Language Runtime (CLR) 中繼資料的組件。

trans-unit.source: The generated assembly name; otherwise, an empty string if the inputs are invalid.
trans-unit.target: 所產生的組件名稱，但如果輸入無效，則為空字串。

trans-unit.source: If necessary, the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.GenerateMetadata.Generate%2A> method generates an assembly that contains CLR metadata for a specified type library.
trans-unit.target: 如有必要，<xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.GenerateMetadata.Generate%2A>方法會產生組件，其中包含指定的類型程式庫的 CLR 中繼資料。

trans-unit.source: To do this processing, it calls the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.GenerateMetadata.GenerateMetaData%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行這項處理，它會呼叫<xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.GenerateMetadata.GenerateMetaData%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: These methods do not need to be called directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 這些方法不需要直接從您的程式碼呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The name of the type library for which to generate an assembly.
trans-unit.target: 要產生組件的類型程式庫名稱。

trans-unit.source: The folder in which to generate an assembly or to locate an already existing assembly.
trans-unit.target: 要在其中產生組件或尋找已存在組件的資料夾。

trans-unit.source: A public key used to import type library information into an assembly.
trans-unit.target: 用來將類型程式庫資訊匯入組件中的公開金鑰 (Public Key)。

trans-unit.source: A strong-named key pair used to sign the generated assembly.
trans-unit.target: 強式名稱金鑰組，用來簽署產生的組件。

trans-unit.source: Generates, or locates, an assembly that contains common language runtime (CLR) metadata for a COM+ component represented by the specified type library, signs the assembly with a strong-named key pair, and installs it in the global assembly cache.
trans-unit.target: 針對由指定類型程式庫表示的 COM+ 元件，產生或尋找包含 Common Language Runtime (CLR) 中繼資料的組件，再以強式名稱金鑰組 (Key Pair) 簽署該組件，並將組件安裝在全域組件快取中。

trans-unit.source: The generated assembly name; otherwise, an empty string if the inputs are invalid.
trans-unit.target: 所產生的組件名稱，但如果輸入無效，則為空字串。

trans-unit.source: If necessary, the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.GenerateMetadata.GenerateMetaData%2A> method generates an assembly that contains CLR metadata for a specified type library.
trans-unit.target: 如有必要，<xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.GenerateMetadata.GenerateMetaData%2A>方法會產生組件，其中包含指定的類型程式庫的 CLR 中繼資料。

trans-unit.source: It does not generate an assembly if an assembly of the generated name already exists in the string `outPath` folder.
trans-unit.target: 它不會產生組件，如果組件產生的名稱已經存在於字串`outPath`資料夾。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.GenerateMetadata.GenerateMetaData%2A> does not need to be called directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.GenerateMetadata.GenerateMetaData%2A> 不需要直接從您的程式碼呼叫。

trans-unit.source: It is called by both the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.GenerateMetadata.Generate%2A> and <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.GenerateMetadata.GenerateSigned%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫此方法同時<xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.GenerateMetadata.Generate%2A>和<xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.GenerateMetadata.GenerateSigned%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: If called by <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.GenerateMetadata.GenerateSigned%2A>, <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.GenerateMetadata.GenerateMetaData%2A> also generates a strong-named key pair, signs the assembly, and installs it in the global assembly cache.
trans-unit.target: 如果由呼叫<xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.GenerateMetadata.GenerateSigned%2A>，<xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.GenerateMetadata.GenerateMetaData%2A>也會產生強式名稱金鑰組、 簽署組件，並將它安裝在全域組件快取中。

trans-unit.source: The name of the type library for which to generate an assembly.
trans-unit.target: 要產生組件的類型程式庫名稱。

trans-unit.source: The folder in which to generate an assembly or to locate an already existing assembly.
trans-unit.target: 要在其中產生組件或尋找已存在組件的資料夾。

trans-unit.source: Ignored.
trans-unit.target: 忽略。

trans-unit.source: A string to which an error message can be written.
trans-unit.target: 可以用來寫入錯誤訊息的字串。

trans-unit.source: Generates, or locates, an assembly that contains common language runtime (CLR) metadata for a COM+ component represented by the specified type library, signs the assembly with a strong-named key pair, and installs it in the global assembly cache.
trans-unit.target: 針對由指定類型程式庫表示的 COM+ 元件，產生或尋找包含 Common Language Runtime (CLR) 中繼資料的組件，再以強式名稱金鑰組 (Key Pair) 簽署該組件，並將組件安裝在全域組件快取中。

trans-unit.source: The generated assembly name; otherwise, an empty string if the inputs are invalid.
trans-unit.target: 所產生的組件名稱，但如果輸入無效，則為空字串。

trans-unit.source: If necessary, the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.GenerateMetadata.GenerateSigned%2A> method generates an assembly that contains CLR metadata for a specified type library.
trans-unit.target: 如有必要，<xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.GenerateMetadata.GenerateSigned%2A>方法會產生組件，其中包含指定的類型程式庫的 CLR 中繼資料。

trans-unit.source: It also generates a strong-named key pair and signs the assembly.
trans-unit.target: 它也會產生強式名稱金鑰組，並簽署組件。

trans-unit.source: To do this processing, it calls the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.GenerateMetadata.GenerateMetaData%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行這項處理，它會呼叫<xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.GenerateMetadata.GenerateMetaData%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: These methods do not need to be called directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 這些方法不需要直接從您的程式碼呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The `InstallGac` parameter indicates whether to install the assembly in the global assembly cache.
trans-unit.target: `InstallGac`參數會指出是否要將組件安裝在全域組件快取中。

trans-unit.source: However, the implementation ignores this value and always attempts to install the signed assembly in the global assembly cache.
trans-unit.target: 不過，實作會忽略此值，而且一律會嘗試將帶正負號的組件安裝在全域組件快取中。

trans-unit.source: The path to be searched for the file.
trans-unit.target: 要在其中搜尋檔案的路徑。

trans-unit.source: The name of the file for which to search.
trans-unit.target: 要搜尋的檔案名稱。

trans-unit.source: An extension to be added to the file name when searching for the file.
trans-unit.target: 在搜尋檔案時，要附加至檔案名稱的副檔名。

trans-unit.source: The size of the buffer that receives the valid path and file name.
trans-unit.target: 接收有效路徑和檔案名稱的緩衝區大小。

trans-unit.source: The buffer that receives the path and file name of the file found.
trans-unit.target: 緩衝區，用來接收找到檔案的路徑和檔案名稱。

trans-unit.source: The variable that receives the address of the last component of the valid path and file name.
trans-unit.target: 變數，用來接收有效路徑和檔案名稱最後一個元件的位址。

trans-unit.source: Searches for a specified file in a specified path.
trans-unit.target: 在指定路徑中搜尋指定檔案。

trans-unit.source: If the search succeeds, the return value is the length of the string copied to <paramref name="buffer" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果搜尋成功，傳回值就是複製到 <paramref name="buffer" /> 的字串長度。

trans-unit.source: If the search fails, the return value is 0.
trans-unit.target: 如果搜尋失敗，則傳回值為 0。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the Platform SDK documentation about SearchPath at [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/fileio/base/searchpath.asp](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/fileio/base/searchpath.asp).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 Platform SDK 文件在 SearchPath 有關[ http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/fileio/base/searchpath.asp ](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/fileio/base/searchpath.asp)。
